Content: Hi just got the bike for a cheap deal because top end need replaced and got it rebuilt myself got everything done went to test drive it and noticed the rear brakes were out and the pads are worn out I've looked and looked everywhere. Anyone ever replaced the pads on these kind of bikes or is there a kit with caliper and pads that fit it?
